 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package opennlp.ccg.lexicon

Interface Summary
SupertaggerAdapter The SupertaggerAdapter interface is for plugging a supertagger into the lexicon in order to return only the desired, high probability categories during lexical lookup.
Tokenizer The Tokenizer interface provides a way to customize tokenization and handling of special tokens.
Word.WordFactory Factory interface.
 

Class Summary
DataItem Data structure for storing information about a lexical entry.
DefaultTokenizer DefaultTokenizer provides a default implementation of the Tokenizer interface.
EnglishExpander EnglishExpander provides methods for expanding numbers, amounts, durations, dates and times as English words.
EntriesItem Data structure for storing information about a category family entry.
FactorChainWord A FactorChainWord represents a word via a chain of references to factor keys, or just to a string in the case of the word form.
FactorChainWord.Factory Factory.
FactorKey Factor key, with identity equals for the factor and value.
Family Lexicon category family.
FullWord A FullWord object is a word with all possible fields.
FullWord.Factory Factory.
Lexicon Contains words and their associated categories and semantics.
LicensingFeature A licensing feature is one which controls the licensing and instantiation of semantically null or marked categories in the realizer.
ListPairWord A ListPairWord represents a word via a list of pairs of interned attributes and values.
MacroAdder Adds the features from macros to a category.
MacroItem Data structure for storing information about morphological macros.
MorphItem A data structure for morphological entries.
SimpleWord A SimpleWord object is a surface word which stores just the word form.
SupertaggerAdapter.LexLogProb Class for caching a lexical item's log prob in a sign.
TrueCaser  
Word A Word object may either be a surface word or a full word.
WordWithPitchAccent A WordWithPitchAccent object is a surface word with an optional pitch accent but no further attributes.
 

Exception Summary
LexException Any exception thrown if something wrong happens in the lexicon.
